decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Site Location Plan; Shakespeareway-13/1 proposed ground; Shakespeareway-13/3 proposed first; Shakespeareway-13/4 proposed second; Shakespeareway-13/5 existing elevations;  Shakespearesway-13/6 proposed elevations; Shakespeareway-13/8 block; Shakespearesway-15/2 existing first and Shakespeareway-13/0 existing ground Received: 21 August 2017, Agent email dated 10 October 2017 ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The existing side extension as shown on approved drawing number "13/1 proposed ground" shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 13 Shakespeare Way, Feltham TW13 7PE.
description: Erection of a hip to gable and rear roof extension with two front roof windows, a first floor side  extension and a single storey rear extension with a roof lantern to the house
